alert.note: Alert for Marion (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 19 at 5:50PM EDT until June 19 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of SOUTH CENTRAL Kentucky, including the following county, Marion. * WHEN...Until 900 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 550 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lebanon, Loretto, Raywick, Saint Mary, Belltown, New Market, Saint Joseph, Jessietown and Calvary. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
